languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханики{/g}, приписанные к капелле астропатического хора, информируют о значительном снижении коммуникационного потенциала. Это, возможно, является последствием телепатического ритуала, в котором Ваша Светлость соизволила участвовать. Также блюстители докладывают, что хормейстер испросил аудиенции с Лорд-капитаном, после чего заперся в капелле и никого не впускает. Требование об аудиенции выглядит дерзостью, но меня не покидает ощущение, что это — зов о помощи".

"Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханики{/g}, приписанные к капелле астропатического хора, информируют о значительном снижении коммуникационного потенциала. Это, возможно, является последствием телепатического ритуала, в котором Ваша Светлость соизволила участвовать. Требование об аудиенции выглядит дерзостью, но меня не покидает ощущение, что это — зов о помощи".

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g} asignados a la Capilla de Astrópatas informan de una limitación significativa de nuestro potencial de comunicación. Podría ser consecuencia del ritual telepático en el que se dignó a participar mil{mf|ord|ady}. Los guardias informan de que el maestro del Coro ha solicitado una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y se ha atrincherado en la capilla desde entonces, impidiendo el paso a todos los demás. Aunque la solicitud de audiencia es osada, me da la sensación de que es una llamada de auxilio».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los lexmecánicos asignados a la Capilla de Astrópatas informan de una limitación significativa de nuestro potencial de comunicación tras los acontecimientos recientes. Los guardias informan de que el maestro del Coro ha solicitado una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y se ha atrincherado en la capilla desde entonces, impidiendo el paso a todos los demás. Aunque la solicitud de audiencia es osada, me da la sensación de que es una llamada de auxilio».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信官の礼拝堂に配属された{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}から、我々の通信能力が大幅に低下していると報告がありました。これは、陛下がご参加されたテレパシー儀式の影響かもしれません。エンフォーサーの報告では、クワイアーマスターはロード・キャプテンとの謁見を求めてからというもの、礼拝堂に閉じこもって、誰も中に入れようとしないとのことです。謁見の要請は随分厚かましいものであることは明らかですが、私にはこれが助けを求める叫びに見えてならないのです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信官の礼拝堂に配属された法技術者から、最近、例の件があって以来、会話する機会が大幅に減ったとの報告が入っています。エンフォーサーの報告では、クワイアーマスターはロード・キャプテンとの謁見を求めてからというもの、礼拝堂に閉じこもって、誰も中に入れようとしないとのことです。謁見を頼むとは随分な言いようにも見えますが、私にはこれが助けを求める叫びに見えてならないのです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，派往星语者礼拜堂的{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}报告说，最近发生了一系列事件之后，我们的通讯能力明显下降，这或许是大人您屈尊参加灵能感应仪式造成的结果。执法者报告说唱诗大师希望能与您见面，还把自己锁在了礼拜堂里，禁止任何人进入。尽管唱诗大师的要求听起来似乎很是胆大妄为，但我总觉得他可能是在寻求您的帮助。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，派往星语者礼拜堂的思律机僧报告说，最近发生了一系列事件之后，我们的通讯能力明显下降。执法者报告说唱诗大师希望能与您见面，还把自己锁在了礼拜堂里，禁止任何人进入。尽管唱诗大师的要求听起来似乎很是胆大妄为，但我总觉得他可能是在寻求您的帮助。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanici{/g}, die der astropathischen Kapelle zugewiesen sind, melden einen deutlichen Abfall des Kommunikationspotenzials. Das könnte eine Folge des telepathischen Rituals sein, an dem sich Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} beteiligt hat. Die Enforcer berichten, dass der Chormeister um eine Audienz mit dem Lord Captain gebeten und sich in die Kapelle eingeschlossen hat. Er lässt niemanden hinein. So kühn die Bitte um eine Audienz auch sein mag, ich werde das Gefühl nicht los, dass das ein Hilferuf ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Lexmechanici, die der astropathischen Kapelle zugewiesen sind, melden einen deutlichen Abfall des Kommunikationspotenzials nach den jüngsten Ereignissen. Die Enforcers berichten, dass der Chormeister um eine Audienz mit dem Lord Captain gebeten und sich in die Kapelle eingeschlossen hat. Er lässt niemanden hinein. So kühn die Bitte um eine Audienz auch sein mag, ich werde das Gefühl nicht los, dass das ein Hilferuf ist."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécaniciens{/g} assignés à la chapelle astropathique signalent une baisse importante de notre potentiel de communication. Il s'agit peut-être là d'une conséquence du rituel télépathique auquel Votre seigneurie a eu la bonté de participer. Les prévôts nous ont quant à eux informés qu'après avoir demandé audience avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, le maître de chœur s'est enfermé dans la chapelle et en interdit l'entrée à qui que ce soit. Aussi effrontée que puisse paraître cette demande d'audience, je pense qu'il s'agit là d'un appel à l'aide. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les lexmécaniciens assignés à la chapelle astropathique signalent une baisse importante de notre potentiel de communication depuis les événements récents. Les prévôts nous ont quant à eux informés qu'après avoir demandé audience avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, le maître de chœur s'est enfermé dans la chapelle et en interdit l'entrée à qui que ce soit. Aussi effrontée que puisse paraître cette demande d'audience, je pense qu'il s'agit là d'un appel à l'aide. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Astropatik Şapel'e tayin edilen {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekaniklerinin{/g} raporlarına göre iletişim potansiyelimizde ciddi bir düşüş mevcut. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin katılımıyla onurlandırdığı telepatik ayinin bir sonucu olabilir. İnfazcılar, Koro Şefi'nin Lord Kaptan'la görüşme talep ettiğini ve o zamandan beri şapele kendini kilitleyerek içeriye kimseyi almadığını raporluyor. Görüşme talebi her ne kadar küstahça görünse de bunun bir yardım çağrısı olduğu hissini bir türlü üzerimden atamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} assigned to the Astropathic Chapel are reporting a significant drop in our communications potential. This may be a consequence of the telepathic ritual in which Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} deigned to participate. The enforcers report that the Choirmaster asked for an audience with the Lord Captain and has since locked himself in the chapel, refusing to let anyone in. As brazen as the audience request may seem, I cannot shake the feeling that it is a cry for help."
